Panamera / S / / GTS / Turbo / S / E-Hyb: Drain engine oil Change oil filter Underbody panels: visual inspection for completeness, secure installation and damage Visual inspection for leaks from underneath (oils and other fluids) Tyres: check condition Brake lines: visual inspection for damage, routing and corrosion Brake hoses: visual inspection for damage Fill in engine oil Emergency call system (ERA-GLONASS, EVAK, ERA-RB): Check battery condition (Eurasian Customs Union only) Reset maintenance interval In vehicles from model year 2022 with Connect Release 3.1: Reset the Smart Service values for the replaced components

Panamera / S / GTS / Turbo / S / E-Hybri: Windscreen wiper/washer system, headlight cleaning system: check function Horn: check function Tyres: check tyre pressure (TPM) Diagnostic system: read out fault memory; reset maintenance interval Check actuator travel of brake shoes Particle filter: replace filter element Seat belts: check function and condition

Check wiper blades All headlights: check adjustment Battery vent hose: check condition Tyres and spare wheel: check condition Radiators and air intakes: visual inspection for external contamination and blockage Brake system: check brake pads and brake discs for wear (without removing wheels) Brake system: check brake pads and brake discs for wear Trailer hitch: check function Drain engine oil Underbody panels: visual inspection for completeness, secure installation and damage Visual inspection for leaks from underneath (oils and other fluids) Brake lines: visual inspection for damage, routing and corrosion Brake hoses: visual inspection for damage Drive shafts: visual inspection of the boots for leaks and damage Steering gear: visual inspection of the bellows for damage Tie rod joints: check play and dust bellows Axle joints: check the play and visually inspect the dust boots for damage Exhaust system: Visual inspection for leaks and damage, check brackets PDK transmission: change oil All-wheel final drive: change oil Rear final drive: change oil

Change oil filter Fill in engine oil Coolant: check level and antifreeze Replace spark plugs Fuel lines and connections: visual inspection Air cleaner: replace filter element Change brake fluid (use only original Porsche brake fluid) Prepare condition report for long-life guarantee Tyre sealing compound: check use-by date and replace if necessary engine, clutch, steering, transmission, ParkAssist, cruise control, PSM switch, heating, Oils, fluids: visual inspection for leaks
